server

Class GeneralServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.GeneralServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class GeneralServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Main Business logic for the server side. It contains everything that the server needs to run properly.

    • Constructor Summary

      • sendToClientLogin

        public void sendToClientLogin(boolean isConnected,
                              int id,
                              java.lang.String role,
                              ConnectionToClient client)
        This method is used to send a client a response of a #LOGIN demand.
        Parameters:
        isConnected - true if the connection succeeded, false otherwise
        id - the user ID. value -1 if not connected.
        role - : the user role. Value null if not connected.
        client - : the original client.

        public void sendToClientFirstConn(boolean hasSucceeded,
                                  ConnectionToClient client)
        This method is used to send a client a response of a #FIRSTCONN demand.
        Parameters:
        hasSucceeded: - true id the first connection was a success, false otherwise.
        client: - the original client.

      • handleLoginFromClient

        public void handleLoginFromClient(java.lang.String login,
                                  java.lang.String password,
                                  ConnectionToClient client)
        This method is used when a client wants to connect. It needs to check in the database to see if credentials matches or not.
        Parameters:
        login - : the email the client provided.
        password: - the password the client provided.
        client: - the original client.

                                            ConnectionToClient client)

        password: - the (new) password the client provided.
        client: - the original client.

      • checkLogin

        public void checkLogin(int id,
                       ConnectionToClient client)
        This method is called when a user has the right credentials and connected. It checks in the DB and grabs the user ID and its role. It always sends true on the login, as it has already been checked.
        Parameters:
        id: - the user ID
        client: - the client from which it originated.

      • handleUpdateEventFromClient

        public void handleUpdateEventFromClient(int idEvent,
                                        java.sql.Date dateTimeEvent,
                                        float duration,
                                        int idRoom,
                                        int idCourse,
                                        int idTeacher,
                                        int idClass,
                                        int idPromo,
                                        int idDepartment,
                                        ConnectionToClient client)
        This method delegates to the dao the event update /**
        Parameters:
        idEvent - : the id of the Event
        dateTimeEvent - : the time and the date when the event begin
        duration - : the duration of the event
        idRoom - : the room when the event will take place
        idCourse - : the course related to the event
        idTeacher - : the teacher related to the event
        idClass - : the class related to the event
        idPromo - : the promotion related to the event
        idDepartment - : the department related to the event
        client - : the asking client.
